TA0036.title: Piracy/Infringement Gangs
TA0036.description: Piracy/infringement gangs are criminal gangs that systematically steal digital content (online courses, software, films, e-books, music, etc.) and redistribute it for profit. Main operating models include: content recording, cracking and distribution, membership sharing, low-price resale, ad monetization, and cross-platform content migration.

references.title: Copyright Law of the People's Republic of China
Online Copyright Protection - National Copyright Administration
